title: Chris Sullivan Wears A Fat Suit In "This Is Us" And People Are Not Happy
text:

NBC His co-star Susan Kelechi Watson, who plays Beth, confirmed the suit to Us Weekly at a press event in January.
ID: 10551688 2. Sullivan himself mentioned the costuming decision in an early February appearance on The Real — albeit briefly — jokingly exclaiming, “Something on television is a lie?!” View this image ›
Warner Bros. ID: 10551942 3. You can watch the full appearance here: Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=iJ33Ay1fe_0 . youtube.com ID: 10551978 4. More recently, his co-star and onscreen love interest Chrissy Metz — who plays Kate on the show — gave her perspective on the matter when a caller on Watch What Happens Live called Sullivan having to wear the suit “ridiculous.” Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=-uacOvppDlo . youtube.com ID: 10551999 5. The caller’s comment came after some of the show’s fans expressed their discomfort about the costuming choice. ID: 10552220 Found out Toby on this is us wears a fat suit and I feel like I've just been lied to

— Korri wissel (@Korriwissel1) ID: 10552229 I just learned Toby on #ThisIsUs wears a fat suit so there goes all the trust I had in anything.
— Madison Packer (@Madpacker4) ID: 10552233 so that guy is wearing a fat suit on #ThisIsUs ? I'm immediately over that ship completely.
— Angry Ferrero Rocher (@exrecluse) ID: 10552235 I can't watch #ThisIsUs the same anymore now that I know that Toby is wearing a fat suit.
— Latoya Watson (@lmwatsonn) ID: 10552239 Does the guy who plays Toby on This Is Us really wear a fat suit? Like they couldn't find an actual overweight white male actor?
— Kathleen (@TrmpledUndrFoot) ID: 10552248 honestly pissed that the actor who plays toby on this is us wears a fat suit - how about some actual representation for plus sized men?
— hannah (@hgdchampion) ID: 10552245 14. “We tested a lot of gentlemen who were bigger,” Metz said on WWHL . “And I get it, people think the authenticity is kind of ruined by [that decision to cast Sullivan], but Chris has been heavier and I think he does understand the plight of being overweight.” View this image ›
NBC / Via Twitter: @nbcthisisus ID: 10551862 15. “And also, he was the best man for the job,” Metz continued. “And people wear prosthetics all the time. This just happens to be weight, as opposed to a nose or a chin.” View this image ›
NBC She also talked about the costume she wore on American Horror Story : “I wore a very large couch, basically, prosthetic suit. It’s just kind of the name of the game.”
ID: 10551906 16. So, you heard ‘em. For now, it seems the fat suit is here to stay. ID: 10552547 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
